code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const IncidentsPage=()=>{const[incidents,setIncidents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{api.get('/api/incidents').then(res=>setIncidents(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error('Incident API Error:',err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Active Incidents"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Key"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Link"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:incidents.map((incident,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:incident.key}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:incident.summary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:incident.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:incident.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"View"})})]},index))})]})]});};export default IncidentsPage;
